Class PatchUtil

    Simple utility for patch management

    • Constructor Detail

      • PatchUtil

        public PatchUtil()

    • Method Detail

      • set

        public static boolean set(Object instance,
                          String fieldName,
                          Object value,
                          boolean patch)
        Update or Patch an instance.
        Parameters:
        instance - The instance to patch.
        fieldName - The name of the property to patch.
        value - The value to use to Update (always change) or Patch the object. May be null => do not patch Object instance parsed from the "null" json string meaning set to null Or an actual object instance that represents the new value to set.
        patch - True if we should patch the instance, false if we should update.
        Returns:
        True if the object has been updated, false if not.
        Throws:
        NoSuchFieldException - In case the field does not exists.

      • setMap

        public static <A,B> Map<A,B> setMap(Map<A,B> instance,
                                    Map<A,B> newValues,
                                    boolean patch)

      • realValue

        public static <T> T realValue(T value)
        Get the actual value that the user wanted to set.
        Parameters:
        value - The value that the user wanted to set.
        Returns:
        Null if the user wanted to remove the actual value. Or the object value.
